original_text: He appointed military officers over the people and assembled them before him in the square at the city gate and encouraged them with these words:
korean_text: 군대 지휘관들을 세워 백성을 거느리게 하고 성문 광장에서 자기 앞에 무리를 모으고 말로 위로하여 이르되

sentences.original_text: He appointed military officers over the people
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 백성 위에 군대 장관들을 임명하고

sentences.original_text: in the square at the city gate
and encouraged them with these words:
